alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 10:42AM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL CHURCHILL... NORTHWESTERN MINERAL AND NORTHERN LYON COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 AM PDT... At 1041 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm along US-95 north of Schurz. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Us 95 At Lyon-Churchill Co Line, Us 95 At Mineral-Lyon Co Line, and Schurz. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
